payload_name.description: Package name after compilation. No spaces.

cs_teamserver_ip.description: IP Address of the teamserver. This field is used by the controller to connect back

cs_teamserver_port.description: Port of the teamserver's External C2 listener. This field is used by the controller to connect back

icmp_callback_server.description: IP address of the callback server that the controller will listen on, and the payload will proxy through. (If running on same machine as TeamServer, use TeamServer IP)

icmp_payload_size.description: Payload size per ICMP request in bytes. Windows default is 32 bytes. Smaller packets = More packets sent, and vice versa

pipename.description: Named pipe to connect your beacon to (must match TeamServer pipename)

sleep_time.description: Time in milliseconds between ICMP requests

payload_max_size.description: Maximum payload size for Cobalt Strike in bytes (512 KB)

buffer_max_size.description: Maximum buffer size in bytes (10 MB) for reading from the Named Pipe
